title: react-hook-form - Performant, flexible forms with easy validation
content: React Hook Form is a library that helps you validate forms in React. It provides performant, flexible forms with easy validation and minimal re-renders. Supports TypeScript and has excellent developer experience.

metadata.description: ðŸ“‹ React Hooks for form state management and validation (Web + React Native)

title: typescript-eslint - Monorepo for all the tooling related to using TypeScript with ESLint
content: TypeScript ESLint provides TypeScript support for ESLint. It consists of a parser and a set of rules that work with TypeScript code. Essential for maintaining code quality in TypeScript projects.

metadata.description: âœ¨ Monorepo for all the tooling related to using TypeScript with ESLint

title: nestjs - A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, reliable and scalable server-side applications
content: NestJS is a framework for building efficient, reliable and scalable Node.js server-side applications. It uses TypeScript by default and combines elements of OOP, FP, and FRP.

metadata.description: A progressive Node.js framework for building efficient, reliable and scalable server-side applications.

title: prisma - Next-generation Node.js and TypeScript ORM
content: Prisma is a next-generation Node.js and TypeScript ORM that provides type safety, auto-completion, and a powerful query engine. It simplifies database access and management.

metadata.description: Next-generation ORM for Node.js & TypeScript | PostgreSQL, MySQL, MariaDB, SQL Server, SQLite, MongoDB and CockroachDB

title: awesome-nodejs - Delightful Node.js packages and resources
content: A curated list of delightful Node.js packages and resources. Covers frameworks, utilities, databases, testing tools, and much more. Regularly updated by the community.
